transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello. Good afternoon ma'am. ID Electronics mein baat ho rahi hai meri?
Customer: Yeah. Ma'am do you understand English or Hindi?
Executive: I'm comfortable in English.
Executive: Okay. Yeah. Ma'am so you have opened one of your tickets here on IndiaMART. But you want to discuss something with your account managers. So I just want to know what issues you actually are facing.
Customer: One of your representative already contacted me.
Executive: Yeah. Actually they are from the production team who are designing your catalog and here on IndiaMART I am your account manager. We can even check that on your profile.
Executive: I'm your account manager Shreya Singh.
Customer: Sorry?
Executive: Yeah. I'm saying I'm saying I'm your account manager here on IndiaMART. So if you have any issues regarding services or anything you can connect with me anytime.
Customer: Yeah, okay.
Executive: Yeah. So can we close your concern now?
Customer: So then please can you give me your contact number or through
Executive: 95
Customer: Okay, just one minute.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Ha okay tell.
Executive: 95
Executive: 9536
Customer: 36
Executive: 26
Customer: 26
Executive: 59
Customer: Sorry?
Executive: 59
Executive: 59
Executive: 05
Customer: 05
Executive: Okay. You can contact Shreya.
Executive: Shreya.
Executive: Yes.
Executive: You can contact me like if you have any of issues regarding IndiaMART or anything you can connect me on that number.
Customer: Oh yeah okay.
Executive: Yeah. And one more thing ma'am you have called on 9696 yesterday. So can I close that concern for now?
Customer: Yes, that is already in progress. That's regarding designing and all one Kausalya contacted us.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Ma'am after that now you will be receiving a feedback for our team. So you can if you are satisfied with that then you can say yes.
Customer: Yes, just a normal feedback okay ma'am.
Executive: You will be receiving that on your mail ID.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Okay ma'am. Okay thank you so much. Have a good day.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wanted to discuss account issues.

- Customer asked for the executive's contact number.

- Executive asked to close previous concern.



Resolution:

- Executive introduced herself as account manager.

- Executive provided her contact number.

- Executive confirmed previous concern was in progress.

- Executive informed about feedback process.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- account manager, contact number, feedback, catalog
